definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: So these were some being yourself quotes and sayings for all of you.
sentences.chinese: 以上這些是給所有讀者們有關實現自我的名言語句。

sentences.english: Mr Jeremy Fisher even had some Quotable Quotes which he had written down along the way.
sentences.chinese: 傑里米教師以至寫上了一些他一路所記的名言雋語。

sentences.english: Traffic safety: it's a dangerous street, I pay more attention to.
sentences.chinese: 交通安全名言馬路如虎口，勸君多留神。

sentences.english: Did you know that his motto, "Yo quiero Taco Bell" is actually a play on words?
sentences.chinese: 你知道他的名言“我愛塔可鍾”其實是個文字遊戲嗎？

sentences.english: As the old saying goes, it's never too late to be what you might have been.
sentences.chinese: 名言有云“成爲你想成爲的人永遠不遲”。

sentences.english: He is a great teacher whose wise sayings have influenced many people in different countries.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位偉大的先師，他的至理名言影響各國許多人。

sentences.english: The great philosopher Plato is also known for some of his quotations on love.
sentences.chinese: 偉大的哲學家柏拉圖也有一些膾炙人口的愛情名言。

sentences.english: There is also a slight over-reliance on quotations that occassionally interrupts the flow of the book.
sentences.chinese: 而且這本書有點濫用名言，經常打斷書的流程。

sentences.english: I'd like to close with another quote from Mark Twain.
sentences.chinese: 我想用馬克吐溫的另一條名言來結束。

sentences.english: You never know out of the mouths of babes and sucklings , remember.
sentences.chinese: 誰知道，不過別忘了，黃口孺子往往能說出至理名言。

sentences.english: You must bear in mind all these wise sayings.
sentences.chinese: 這些至理名言你可要謹記在心。

sentences.english: There is a famous proverb"Life lies in movement".
sentences.chinese: “生命在於運動”，這是一名句至理名言。

sentences.english: Each chapter begins with an epigraph, a quote to enlighten and amuse.
sentences.chinese: 各章開頭引用了一句名言，以啓迪思考，娛悅身心。

sentences.english: This is to associate one of logion that accuse an assistant president to hold president Liu Chuanzhi concurrently.
sentences.chinese: 這是聯想控股副董事長兼總裁柳傳志的名言之一。

sentences.english: Collection of famous quotes and collection of mottoes are the most important treasure of the society.
sentences.chinese: 名言集和格言集是社會最可貴的財富。

sentences.english: To quote Spider - Man's late uncle : "With great power comes great responsibility."
sentences.chinese: 正如蜘蛛俠的最新名言“攬大權者擔重任。”

definition: quotation (from a book or existing source)
Zen saying repeated as cant/(fig.) catchphrase/mantra/favorite expression/stock phrase
